items.title: President's church donation sparks Kenyan clashes
items.description: Police fire tear gas to stop protesters occupying a church which had accepted William Ruto's donation.

items.title: Pope Francis thanks medical staff for 'tender' care
items.description: The Vatican said on Saturday the Pope had shown a "good response" in recent days to his treatment at Rome's Gemelli hospital.

items.title: Syrians describe terror as Alawite families killed in their homes
items.description: Witnesses said the situation stabilised when security forces arrived following the violence.

items.title: Syria leader calls for peace after hundreds of civilians killed
items.description: More than 700 civilians of the Alawite religious minority have been killed, the British-based Syrian Observatory for Human Rights says.

items.title: Secret Service shoots armed man outside White House
items.description: President Donald Trump was not in the White House at the time.
